Yemen

07 Feb 2014

Interesting Fact

In the past, Yemen was an influential center of trade and power in the Middle East, deemed Arabia Felix (Happy Arabia) in by the Romans. However, it is now a relatively poor country with a 65% unemployment rate.

Published on 07 Feb 2014 • Find me on Twitter!
